snippet: Greg Shaheen, one of the N.C.A.A.’s officials most closely identified with the men’s basketball tournament, could soon be out of a job.
abstract: Analysis; Greg Shaheen, one of the NCAA’s officials most closely identified with the men’s basketball tournament, could soon be out of a job.
lead_paragraph: Greg Shaheen, one of the N.C.A.A.’s officials most closely identified with the men’s basketball tournament, could soon be out of a job.

headline.seo: This Year’s Final Four Could Be the Final One for Greg Shaheen, an N.C.A.A. Official
headline.main: This Year’s Final Four Could Be the Last One for an N.C.A.A. Official
headline.print_headline: Possible Farewell for a Key Figure
